definition: color printing/abbr. for 彩色印刷[cai3 se4 yin4 shua1]
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

sentences.english: Our company specializes in producing all kinds of complex color printing packaging products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司專業生產各種複合彩印包裝製品。

sentences.english: It is specially designed for high-grade color printing. Several patents on record.
sentences.chinese: 本機專爲高檔彩印設計，多項專利在案。

sentences.english: Our company is a professional manufacturer of color printing packaging.
sentences.chinese: 我們公司是一家專業生產彩印包裝。

sentences.english: We see the shift from black and white to color.
sentences.chinese: 我們看到了從黑白到彩印的轉變。

sentences.english: The souvenir medal is made of pure silver, adopting the embossment color printing technology.
sentences.chinese: 此款紀念牌分爲純銀材質，浮雕彩印工藝。

sentences.english: Translated Title: Color Printing & Packing Co. , Ltd. Dalian St.
sentences.chinese: 大連聖嘉彩印包裝有限公司。

sentences.english: Our company specializes in manufacturing cardboard boxes and various types of color printing and plastic products.
sentences.chinese: 本公司專業生產製造紙箱和各類彩印及塑料製品。

sentences.english: Founded in 2003, mainly engaged in production of packaging color.
sentences.chinese: 公司成立於二00三年，主要從事彩印包裝生產。

sentences.english: True Plastic Color Printing Co. , Ltd. Nantong General.
sentences.chinese: 南通普真塑料彩印有限公司翻譯過來是？

definition: color printing using several overlaid images
color printing using several overlaid images
intaglio printing plate (or a print made with it)
